## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0ec695cd6837a20be32620ca456e5bae17b10b0fea4304e81e743f1b31c985c7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vulnerable-dependency' @ 10.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
